title: A Distributional Representation Model For Collaborative Filtering
authors: Z Junlin, C Heng, H Tongwen, X Huiping - arXiv preprint arXiv:1502.04163
excerpt: Abstract: In this paper, we propose a very concise deep learning approach for collaborative filtering that jointly models distributional representation for users and items. The proposed framework obtains better performance when compared against current state-of-art  ...
